name: banking-api
description: Payment processing API for compliance, routing, and settlement

getAccountBalance.title: Get real-time account balance
getAccountBalance.description: Retrieve current and available balance for an account

getAccountCompliance.title: Get compliance information for account
getAccountCompliance.description: Retrieve compliance alerts and information for a given account ID

getAccountLimits.title: Get account transaction limits
getAccountLimits.description: Retrieve current transaction limits for an account

listPayments.title: List payments with filters
listPayments.description: List all payments with optional filtering by status, date range, and amount

listPendingApprovals.title: List payments pending approval

getPayment.title: Get payment by transaction ID
getPayment.description: Retrieve payment details and current status by transaction ID

getRiskAssessment.title: Get latest risk assessment for entity
getRiskAssessment.description: Retrieve the most recent risk assessment for a given entity

getSettlement.title: Get settlement by ID

freezeAccount.title: Freeze account transactions
freezeAccount.description: Temporarily freeze all transactions on an account

updateAccountLimits.title: Update account transaction limits
updateAccountLimits.description: Update transaction limits for an account

unfreezeAccount.title: Unfreeze account transactions
unfreezeAccount.description: Restore transaction capabilities on a frozen account

initiatePayment.title: Initiate payment transaction
initiatePayment.description:
Initiates a high-value international payment with full compliance checks, routing decisions, and fraud analysis.
    Supports wire transfers, SWIFT, ACH, and real-time payment rails.

    Features:
    - 8-level nested structure with complete entity verification
    - Real-time fraud analysis and risk scoring
    - Automatic routing optimization based on cost, speed, and reliability
    - Multi-jurisdiction regulatory compliance checks
    - Comprehensive audit trail with actor tracking

approvePayment.title: Approve a pending payment
approvePayment.description: Approve a payment requiring dual authorization

cancelPayment.title: Cancel a pending payment
cancelPayment.description: Cancel a payment that is in PENDING or PROCESSING status

rejectPayment.title: Reject a pending payment
rejectPayment.description: Reject a payment requiring dual authorization

retryPayment.title: Retry a failed payment
retryPayment.description: Retry a payment that previously failed

executeReconciliation.title: Execute multi-party transaction reconciliation
executeReconciliation.description:
Performs comprehensive reconciliation across multiple accounts and payment systems.
    Used for nostro/vostro account reconciliation and break management.

    Features:
    - Multi-account position matching with configurable tolerances
    - Automated break detection and root cause analysis
    - Aging bucket classification for unmatched items
    - Pattern recognition for recurring reconciliation issues
    - Recommended corrective actions with priority scoring

assessRisk.title: Comprehensive multi-dimensional risk assessment
assessRisk.description:
Performs deep risk analysis for credit decisions, transaction limits, and counterparty evaluation.
    Uses financial statements, credit bureau data, and ML models for forward-looking risk prediction.

    Features:
    - Multi-dimensional risk scoring (credit, operational, market, liquidity)
    - Credit limit and pricing tier recommendations
    - Peer benchmarking and percentile rankings
    - Forward-looking indicators and predictive analytics
    - Model explainability with SHAP values and feature importance
    - Required collateral calculations based on risk profile

screenEntity.title: Screen entity against sanctions lists
screenEntity.description: Screen an entity against OFAC, UN, and EU sanctions lists

executeSettlement.title: Execute multi-currency settlement with netting optimization
executeSettlement.description:
Executes end-of-day settlement operations across multiple currencies and counterparties.
    Includes bilateral/multilateral netting, liquidity optimization, and collateral management.

    Features:
    - Gross and net settlement calculation with configurable netting arrangements
    - Multi-currency FX rate application
    - Liquidity optimization to minimize intraday credit exposure
    - Collateral pledge and release management
    - Settlement priority sequencing for systemic risk management
    - Real-time position tracking and reconciliation

enrichTransaction.title: Enrich transaction with analytics and categorization
enrichTransaction.description:
Enriches raw transaction data with merchant information, categorization, location intelligence,
    and behavioral analytics for fraud detection and customer insights.

    Features:
    - Multi-source data enrichment from merchant databases and third-party providers
    - ML-based categorization with hierarchical taxonomy
    - Behavioral pattern analysis and anomaly detection
    - Predictive analytics for customer lifetime value and churn risk
    - Data quality scoring and confidence metrics
